meanings.sent1: She kept misentering the password and couldn't log in.
meanings.sent2: He realized he was misentering the address on the package.
meanings.sent3: The student's habit of misentering numbers led to funny calculation results.
meanings.sent4: Misentering the code felt like trying to fit a square peg into a round hole.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of misentering can be frustrating and time-consuming.

meanings.definition: To make a mistake in entering information.
meanings.sent1: After misentering the phone number, she couldn't reach her friend.
meanings.sent2: The employee apologized for misentering the customer's order.
meanings.sent3: Misentering the meeting time caused a mix-up in everyone's schedules.
meanings.sent4: She felt like misentering the details was like stumbling in the dark.
meanings.sent5: Avoid misentering important details to prevent confusion later on.

meanings.sent1: The cashier was misentering the prices of items at the checkout.
meanings.sent2: He realized he had been misentering the measurements in the spreadsheet.
meanings.sent3: Misentering the ingredients in the recipe resulted in a strange-tasting dish.
meanings.sent4: She felt like misentering the data was like trying to solve a puzzle with missing pieces.
meanings.sent5: Double-check your work to avoid misentering crucial information.
